Summary: Arthur and Merlin were just going on a hunting trip. It was meant to be a nice, easy trip through the woods around Camelot. It ended with them being chased by an unknown monster into an unknown cave, stepping out into an unknown world. Maybe the weird bard and the magic monster hunter they found in the woods could help? Jaskier and Geralt were on their way north for the winter—Jaskier to Oxenfurt, Geralt to Kaer Morhen. But they were still a ways away when two odd men claiming to be from a place called “Camelot” stumbled into them. Geralt immediately learned Merlin has magic, and Jaskier could see the chemistry between the pair from a mile away. Arthur wanted to get back to Camelot.Merlin wanted to get back to Camelot, and stay alive while his magic seemed intent on acting bizarre.Geralt wanted to travel with Jaskier.Jaskier wanted to travel with Geralt, and get those two idiots to confess everything.
